DOC.HEADLINE: PEOPLE
DOC.TEXT: Thomas W . Velleca has been named to the new position of senior_vice_president of exploration of Arco.Velleca , 60 , had been senior_vice_president of Exploration for Arco International Oil & Gas Co . Velleca will be based in Plano , Texas , and report directly to Executive_Vice_President William E . Wade Jr . in Los Angeles . Velleca will manage the various processes assuring the best allocation of exploration capital , prospect selection and the direction of exploration research . He will also be responsible_for developing and placing exploration personnel . Velleca joined the Los Angeles-based oil_company in 1993 after a long career with Shell Oil Co .
